title: Can you make a living from direct selling?
text:
Podcasts Can you make a living from direct selling?

Have you ever thought of signing up to sell make-up, health drinks or cleaning products to make some extra cash?

In this week's My Money My Lifestyle podcast, Maya Fisher-French and Mapalo Makhu chat to journalist Angelique Ruzicka about whether direct selling is a way to make your millions or just a disguised pyramid scheme.

Fisher-French also chats to personal finance blogger Brendan Dale about why the profit when selling your home may actually be a loss.
description: Have you ever thought of signing up to sell make-up, health drinks or cleaning products to make some extra cash?
